branchCategory.name: ZHP, Vacuum Pad with Generator
branchCategory.description: <p>Vacuum pad and generator are integrated for space savings. The two-stage generator increases suction flow up to 50% and reduces air consumption up to 30%. Design features allow for daisy-chain piping and the mounting with lock plates makes for easier maintenance.</p>
